title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated with an excellent 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes. Created by the acclaimed Vince Gilligan and starring Rhea Seehorn, it's a prestige drama on Apple TV.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Boasting an impressive 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes, this HBO series features Emmy-winning Mark Ruffalo and comes from 'Mare of Easttown' creator Brad Ingelsby.
